らしい: (らしい) - seeming ... (expresses judgment based on evidence, reason or trustworthy hearsay)/appearing ...; (after a noun, adverb or adjective stem) -ish/like a .../typical of .../appropriate for .../becoming of .../worthy of the name ...
らしんばん座: (らしんばんざ) - Pyxis (constellation); the Compass Box
らちが明かない: (ラチがあかない) - make no progress; remain unsettled
らっしゃる: (らっしゃる) - to be; to come; to go
らっぱ吹き: (らっぱふき) - bugler/trumpeter; blowing one's own horn
らふてえ: (ラフティー) - Okinawan-style stewed pork cubes; boned pork rib meat, cut into 5 cm squares, stewed in awamori, soy, dashi broth, and sugar
らりる: (ラリる) - to become intoxicated (e.g. with drugs)
られる: (られる) - (れる for 五段 verbs, られる for 一段. Follows the imperfective form of  and  verbs)  indicates passive voice (incl. the "suffering passive"); (no imperative form. Infrequently used in modern Japanese, e.g. 歩ける is favoured over 歩かれる)  indicates the potential form; (no imperative form) indicates spontaneous occurrence; (no imperative form) used as an honorific for others' actions
らん用: (らんよう) - abuse; misuse; misappropriation; using to excess
ら抜き: (らぬき) - 'ra'-removed; the practice of skipping the 'ra' from the 'rareru' verb conjugation
ら抜き言葉: (らぬきことば) - 'ra'-removed word (i.e. lacking the 'ra' in the 'rareru' verb conjunction)
りゅうこつ座: (りゅうこつざ) - Carina (constellation); the Keel
りゅう天に登る: (りゅうてんにのぼる) - rise of the dragon (bringing rain around the time of the spring equinox)
りょうけん座: (りょうけんざ) - {astron} Canes Venatici (constellation); the Hunting dogs
りんご摘み: (りんごつみ) - picking apples; harvesting apples
りんご飴: (りんごアメ) - candied apple; toffee apple
りん木: (リンボク) - Prunus spinulosa (Japanese species of prunus)
るんるん気分: (るんるんきぶん) - euphoric mood; exuberant mood
れる: (られる) - (れる for 五段 verbs, られる for 一段. Follows the imperfective form of  and  verbs)  indicates passive voice (incl. the "suffering passive"); (no imperative form. Infrequently used in modern Japanese, e.g. 歩ける is favoured over 歩かれる)  indicates the potential form; (no imperative form) indicates spontaneous occurrence; (no imperative form) used as an honorific for others' actions
ろう城: (ろうじょう) - holding a castle (during a siege)/holing up; confinement (to one's home)/staying at home/staying indoors
ろくぶんぎ座: (ろくぶんぎざ) - {astron} Sextans (constellation); the Sextant
ろくろっ首: (ろくろっくび) - rokurokubi; long-neck woman; monstrous person (often a woman) with a neck that can expand and contract (in Japanese folklore)
ろくろ回し: (ろくろまわし) - shaping ceramics on a pottery wheel/spinning a pottery wheel; (joc) gesticulating with your hands as if you were shaping ceramics on a pottery wheel
ろくろ首: (ろくろくび) - rokurokubi; long-neck woman; monstrous person (often a woman) with a neck that can expand and contract (in Japanese folklore)
ろにん: (ろにん) - (misspelling of ろうにん)  ronin/wandering samurai without a master to serve; out of work; waiting for another chance to enter a university
ろは: (ろは) - (只 is composed of ロハ)  free
ろは台: (ロハだい) - free seat (i.e. a park bench)
ろれつが回らない: (ろれつがまわらない) - speaking inarticulately (slurring, lisping, etc.)
ろ紙クロマトグラフィー: (ろしクロマトグラフィー) - paper chromatography
ろ紙ディスク: (ろしディスク) - filter paper disk
ろ紙電気泳動: (ろしでんきえいどう) - paper electrophoresis
わ: (わ) - (at sentence end) indicates emotion or admiration; (at sentence end) indicates emphasis; wah!; boo!
わい: (わえ) - (sentence end, mainly male) indicates emotion
わいせつ行為: (わいせつこうい) - act of obscenity; obscene act; lewd act; indecent act; indecent conduct; indecent behavior; indecent behaviour; sexual molestation
わいな: (わいな) - (at sentence-end)  indicates emotion and emphasis
わいの: (わいな) - (at sentence-end)  indicates emotion and emphasis
わいのう: (わいな) - (at sentence-end)  indicates emotion and emphasis
わいわい: (わいわい) - noisily; clamorously; many people making a din
わい小: (わいしょう) - diminutive; pygmy; pigmy; stunted
わい小不規則銀河: (わいしょうふきそくぎんが) - dwarf irregular galaxy
わえ: (わえ) - (sentence end, mainly male) indicates emotion
わかし湯: (わかしゆ) - hot water (esp. cold mineral spring water heated up at the right temperature for bathing)
わかち書き: (わかちがき) - separating words in Japanese with spaces (e.g. in kana-only books for children)
わからず屋: (わからずや) - (わからずや is a gikun reading of 没分暁漢) obstinate person; blockhead
わかれ道: (わかれみち) - branch; forked road; crossroads; branch road; parting of the ways; turning point
わが国: (わがくに) - our country; our land; one's own country
わが子: (わがこ) - one's own child; one's own children
わが家: (わがいえ) - one's house; one's home; one's family
わが意を得たり: (わがいをえたり) - that's just what I thought; that's exactly like I feel; that's exactly what I think, too
わが校: (わがこう) - our school; my school
わが物: (わがもの) - one's own property; possessions
わが物にする: (わがものにする) - to make something one's own; to appropriate for oneself
わが社: (わがしゃ) - our company; my company
わが身: (わがみ) - myself/oneself; I/me; you (referring to one's inferior)
わが輩: (わがはい) - I (nuance of arrogance)/me/myself; we/us/ourselves
わが闘争: (わがとうそう) - Mein Kampf (by Adolf Hitler, 1925-1926)
わきが甘い: (わきがあまい) - {sumo} preventing one's opponent from getting an underarm grip; having weak defenses
わきに置く: (わきにおく) - to lay aside; to set aside
わき上がる: (わきあがる) - (esp. 沸き上がる) to boil up/to come to the boil/to seethe; to arise/to break out; to get excited/to be in uproar
